messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE FILE: #R-4591-ZL DATE: 04/02/31  A major drug bust occurred at the Port of Everglow when law enforcement intercepted a massive shipment of illegal substances believed to be making its way inland. The operation was a result of weeks of undercover investigation, meticulous planning, and coordination between various departments.  LAW ENFORCEMENT RESPONSE:  LEAD DETECTIVE: Detective P. Q. R. Stanton, experienced in narcotics investigations, led the team, coordinating undercover operatives and gathering intel on the suspected shipment. UNDERCOVER OPERATIONS: Detective S. T. U. McKenzie, with years of undercover experience, infiltrated the smuggling ring, relaying crucial information back to the precinct. PORT AUTHORITY LIAISON: Captain V. W. X. Torres liaised with the port authorities, facilitating checks on suspicious containers without raising alarms. SURVEILLANCE: Patrol Officer Y. Z. A. Gilbert, alongside her team, maintained covert surveillance on key suspects, documenting their movements and interactions. SWAT COORDINATION: Captain B. C. D. Rhodes was in charge of coordinating the SWAT team, ensuring a swift and safe operation during the actual bust. The meticulous planning and efforts of the team led to the successful seizure of over 50 kilos of illegal substances, numerous arrests, and the dismantling of a major smuggling ring. This operation was hailed as a triumph for law enforcement and a blow to illicit drug trade networks.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Detective P. Q. R. Stanton  
Officer Context: Detective Stanton coordinated undercover operatives and gathered crucial intelligence.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective S. T. U. McKenzie  
Officer Context: Detective McKenzie went undercover, infiltrating the smuggling ring and providing valuable information.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Captain V. W. X. Torres  
Officer Context: Captain Torres facilitated checks with port authorities and kept the operation discreet.  
Officer Role: Captain 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer Y. Z. A. Gilbert  
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Gilbert led a surveillance team, tracking and documenting suspect activities.  
Officer Role: Patrol Officer 

Officer Name: Captain B. C. D. Rhodes  
Officer Context: Captain Rhodes managed the SWAT team, ensuring a successful and secure bust.  
Officer Role: Captain
